title: Quantify Rhythmic Gene Co-Expression Relative to a Reference
text: deltaccd infers progression circadian rhythms using gene co-expression. deltaccd works even samples labeled time day cover entire circadian cycle. details method see used analyze circadian gene expression human cancer, check Shilts et al. (PeerJ) accompanying results.
